author: Florence Ion
title: Apple Gives iPhone 14 Users an Extra Year of Emergency SOS Via Satellite
description: Good news, iPhone users. A year after introducing the feature to its walled garden, Apple has extended free access to Emergency SOS via satellite to the iPhone 14/14 Pro for another year. As previously expected, you get three years of Emergency SOS via satell…
